Class GamePiece

  • java.lang.Object
    • ScreenItem
      • GamePiece
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Barrier, Bird, Frog, Insect

    public abstract class GamePiece
extends ScreenItem
    Abstract superclass to handle creation of game pieces on the game board.
    Author:
    David Alligood
